message: If you are looking for Duaina, she is out in the backyard.
Sorry, we are closed. If you want to practice your reading skills, please come back another day. If there is a specific book you are looking for, I might be able to help you.
He he. They will never know what hit them.
Oh, hello! Never mind me, I am just strolling along here. Nothing strange about that. See?
*cough* Please leave me be. I haven't *cough* done anything!
Hey, what are you doing in here? Don't try any funny business.
We don't get many visitors here these days. I hope you like what you see here in Remgard.
This is no place for children. You had better leave.
See this? The harvested crops have begun to rot. Argh, I knew we should have fixed that door when we had the chance.
Ah, isn't this place nice? What else could anyone wish for? This place has all that a man needs - good food, a warm bed and people to exchange stories with.
